title: 115_hr3235
content: The Act may be cited as the "Wetland Determinations Efficiency and Transparency Act". Administration of wetland determinations is addressed in the Act. Section 1222(a) of the Food Security Act of 1985 is amended to include timely completion requirements for wetland delineations, determinations, or certifications. The Secretary must ensure completion within 60 days of a request under this subtitle. The Secretary must ensure timely completion of wetland delineations, determinations, or certifications within 60 days of a request under the Food Security Act of 1985. If not completed on time, a transition period will be provided for compliance without affecting eligibility for program loans or payments. The Secretary must ensure timely completion of wetland delineations, determinations, or certifications within 60 days of a request under the Food Security Act of 1985. A wetland delineation, determination, or certification made by the Secretary is considered a final agency action subject to judicial review. In case of a dispute, the Secretary must provide a copy of the agency record to the person involved. The Secretary must provide a copy of the agency record to a person involved in a dispute regarding wetland delineation within 30 days of the request. The burden of proof lies with the Secretary in case of a dispute, and individuals can still use the existing administrative appeal process. Technical assistance is permitted under Section 3. Section 1244(e) of the Food Security Act of 1985 is amended to allow for third-party technical assistance in conservation planning and wetland delineation, excluding the Natural Resources Conservation Service. The Food Security Act of 1985 allows for third-party technical assistance in conservation planning and wetland delineation, with documented evidence required for the Secretary's rejection of determinations made by approved sources. The Food Security Act of 1985 allows third-party technical assistance in conservation planning and wetland delineation. Section 1222(b)(1)(G) is amended to specify the date of return of wetland characteristics.
